website_summaries.verdict: A small and efficient external hard drive compatible with the Xbox One, X, and S consoles.
pros: Slender design makes it easy to store the hard drive out of sight or in a pocket
Aluminum exterior offers great weather and impact protection
cons: Formatting the hard drive for use on the Xbox may take a couple of attempts

customer_reviews.title: So easy, you won't break a sweat.
customer_reviews.text: All I did was plug this into the USB port on the back of the Xbox One and it found it so easily that I was and am still amazed on how easy this was. It works perfectly. Do not go cheap, other reviews say this doesn't work and they had to format it and all that and I don't know what they bought but it wasn't this product, this came preformatted to the Xbox One and again it works perfectly. I am Highly recommending this for your Xbox One. Happy Gaming Peeps.
customer_reviews.author: Gojira 45

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This product has saved me a lot of hassle because now I do not have to delete games just so I can install new ones. I would recommend to any one to purchase this product. I am even considering buy another unit to increase storage capacity even more so I always have my favorite games ready when I decide to replay them again. Was very easy to install, just plug unit in and system immediately acknowledges that you have additional storage available.
customer_reviews.author: Big Mike B

customer_reviews.title: just to say that this was so easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Quick review, just to say that this was so easy to set up. Including opening the box, took me less than 3 minutes before I bumped my free space on my X1 from 40GB to 1.8TB. Seamless set up, just as described. The seller got it to me on time, so I'm happy. Truth be told, I was about to spend $400 on a new X1 - 1TB version, not realizing (being a fuddy-duddy) that this was available. My son pointed it out to me and it's the best $140 I ever spent... or maybe I should say the best $260 I ever saved.
customer_reviews.author: AnthonyWrites

customer_reviews.title: Once the device is recognized you can move it to the back usb ports and everything should work fine. I have had no issues with m
customer_reviews.text: Several people seem to be having issues wit the device being recognized over and over during gameplay or not being recognized at all. Make sure it is plugged into the side usb port. Once the device is recognized you can move it to the back usb ports and everything should work fine. I have had no issues with mine, been working great
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my boyfriend January 26th of 2019. It was super easy to use and made it so he could hold more games on his xbox. Essentially that’s all I wanted, but I’d have liked it to last a bit longer. About a couple months ago he tried playing one of the games which was downloaded on the hard drive and it wouldn’t load. No game on the hard drive would load. An error message popped up and upon googling it learned I was basically screwed. So I wouldn’t personally purchase if you’re hoping it’ll last a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will need to initialize and format this drive in disc management.
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival the drive was seemingly D.O.A. It was only accessable through windows disc management administration and needed love. but after that it works fine, no frills, it just works. yes, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix1969

customer_reviews.title: Slower than expected
customer_reviews.text: Hi. This was my first solid state drive. So I decided to buy the 500GB version one first and if it works well then I'll buy a bigger capacity version. I'm currently using it for my Xbox One X. So far I haven't noticed any significant improved loading times. Maybe a little with Skyrim but not first person shooter games. It's just not as fast as what I expecting from this. But I will keep using it and update my review in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: For me, the product wasnt good. Could be different for you.
customer_reviews.text: Its good for storage but for some reason when I'm in the middle if playing a game that's on my hard drive, the game will cut off then a few seconds later, my Xbox would say that my external hard drive is ready to use again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: ESSENTIAL TO XBOX USERS
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son as part of his Christmas gift, and he loves it! He says this enable him to play and communicate with his group of friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sonji

customer_reviews.title: Pretty frustrating, plus a waste of money (with update)
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a couple of months with my xbox one, and then failed. I was constantly getting kicked out of games until I realized this was the culprit. Pretty frustrating, plus a waste of money. I wouldn't get this for your xbox one. Update: Just call the toll free number, and the guy picks up the phone. He is helpful, and is happy to replace for you. My new unit is working so far. If it fails, I'm sure they guy will replace it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Been using for awhile now, it’s easy set up and easy to use, just plug in. I am having some trouble with the hard drive, every now and then. Sometimes the storage won’t show up even though it’s plugged into my Xbox one. Idk if this is because of how old my Xbox is, or something on the hard drives end. It’s an easy fix of unplugging it and plugging it back in. But it makes me nervous.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I've had this hard drive since July of 2015 and its still going strong. The only issue I've had is that for some reason it stops being recognized by my Xbox and I'll have to plug it into a different USB port to make it work again, but that has only happened twice since I bought it. Other than that, zero issues. It's definitely worth your money if you're in the market for a reliable hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey F.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Came As Advertised And Is TOTALLY Worth The Purchase. :) EDIT: Be Very Careful With Power Outages From Storms I Got This In 2017 And It’s 2019 And We Caught A Few Storms And Apparently They Can Short The Hard Drives So Now I Have To Grab Another One So Just Be Warned In Case It’s Storming Out

product_meta.title: Oyen Digital U32 Shadow 1TB USB-C External Hard Drive for Xbox One / X / S
product_meta.description: Capacity:1TB| Color:Slate GrayThe U32 Shadow USB-C portable drive provides a simple and efficient way to provide external storage for your Xbox One - making it a perfect solution for gamers who need additional storage space. The drive is plug-and-play ready with the Xbox One / X /S. Simply connect the drive to a USB port in the Xbox One and it will be available for use within seconds. Access and play your entire game collection directly from the U32 Shadow! The stylish design features a unique aluminum body engineered to effectively dissipate heat and provide durable portability. With a compact size, it fits easily into your pocket for maximum portability. Bring your U32 Shadow to a friend's house and connect to their Xbox One for games on-the-go. Finally, the U32 Shadow is backed by a three year factory warranty.
feature_bullets: Aluminum housing provides excellent protection and heat dissipation
USB Powered Hard Drive, no wall adapter needed
Plug and play compatible with the Xbox One / X / S

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars337 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
